scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n shared,server,client "npm --prefix shared install" "npm --prefix server install" "npm --prefix client install"
scripts.start: concurrently -n shared,server,client "npm --prefix shared start" "npm --prefix server start" "npm --prefix client start"
scripts.build: concurrently -n shared,server,client "npm --prefix shared run build" "npm --prefix server run build" "npm --prefix client run build"
